title: Adjust chatroom header stat spacing and LIVE badge placement

requirements.summary: Reduce the horizontal gap in the ChatArea header stats row to 0.5rem between message/reply count, view count, and category badge.
acceptanceCriteria: In `ChatArea.tsx`, the container that lays out message/reply count, view count, and category badge uses a 0.5rem horizontal gap (e.g., Tailwind `gap-2`).
Visual verification: the spacing between the message/reply count group and view count group is 0.5rem.
Visual verification: the spacing between the view count group and the category badge (when present) is 0.5rem.

file_operations.description: Update the header stats-row container spacing from 1rem to 0.5rem by changing the horizontal gap utility (e.g., `gap-4` to `gap-2`) for the row containing message count, view count, and category badge.

requirements.summary: Move the LIVE indicator into the ChatArea header stats row to the right of the category badge (or after other stats when category is absent) with 0.5rem spacing.
acceptanceCriteria: When `chatroom.isLive` is true and `chatroom.category` is present, the LIVE indicator renders immediately to the right of the category badge in the stats row.
The horizontal gap between the category badge and the LIVE indicator is 0.5rem.
When `chatroom.category` is not present and `chatroom.isLive` is true, the LIVE indicator still renders in the stats row to the right of the existing stats items with consistent 0.5rem spacing.

file_operations.description: Reposition the LIVE indicator so it renders within the header stats row after the category badge when present (otherwise after the view-count group), ensuring the stats-row container uses 0.5rem spacing (e.g., `gap-2`) so the categoryâ†”LIVE separation is also 0.5rem. Remove the existing LIVE indicator rendering next to the chatroom title so it appears only in the stats row.
